DOC.brief_summary: The present study single arm clinical trial aim improve key technology diagnosis treatment early stage lung cancer . 60,000 high-risk subject ( age 45-70 ) plan recruit assign Low Dose Computed Tomography ( LDCT ) screen arm ( Baseline + 2 round biennial repeat LDCT screen ) . Management positive screen test carry pre-specified protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Precision Diagnosis Therapy Early Stage Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: • Eligible participant age 4570 year , either follow risk factor : 1. history cigarette smoke ≥ 20 packyears , , former smoker , quit within previous 15 year ; 2. malignant tumor history immediate family member ; 3. personal cancer history ; 4. professional exposure carcinogen ; 5. long term exposure secondhand smoke ; 6. long term exposure cook oil fume . 1 . Had CT scan chest within last 12 month 2 . History cancer within 5 year
